original_text: Moses spoke to the Israelites on the first day of the 11th month, in the 40th year of their journey. He told the Israelites the message that the Lord had commanded him to speak.
korean_text: 마흔째 해 열한째 달 그 달 첫째 날에 모세가 이스라엘 자손에게 여호와께서 그들을 위하여 자기에게 주신 명령을 다 알렸으나

sentences.original_text: on the first day of the 11th month
in the 40th year of their journey
He told the Israelites the message
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 이스라엘 백성에게 그 메시지를 전했다

sentences.original_text: that the Lord had commanded him to speak
